titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on yarn of carded cashmere yarn coarser than 19.35 metric.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/12/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on yarn of carded cashmere yarn coarser than 19.35 metric.
